## Matrix.getSparseData() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSparseData(): Map<number, Map<number, S>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Map<number, Map<number, S>>`

The contents of the matrix as a nested map of rowIndex to columnIndex to nonzero value
